text:
Quizlet is hiring in SF :slightly_smiling_face: <https://quizlet.com/jobs/122992>
We are an education tech startup building a learning platform for users on web and mobile. The android app has over 5 million installs and we're looking to expand on a great engineering team. No remote, but visa sponsorship is possible. The link is to the :android: role, but feel free to check out the other positions, as well :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: Android Engineer | Quizlet
attachments.text: Want to build useful and intuitive Android apps for one of the top education brands in the world?

text: <@U0546QERR|damien5314> pinned a message to this channel.
no, unfortunately. i'm not sure if there would be any relocation benefit for people outside of SF bay area but it's probably negotiable
